title: Day 912
content:
# Day 912

Each day is a gift. Every laugh is a blessing. We spend so much time chasing we get lost in the journey. Slow down. Smell the roses. Thank God for all that is good. Our time on this planet will not last forever and that's okay.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*IQrOoSBoZa8xfOHhV4ueKw.png)

9/19/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
